alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 2:34PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Accumulating Snow Monday Through Wednesday... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in riverton. * WHAT...4 to 6 inches of snow, with locally higher amounts of 8 to 10 inches possible along far eastern portions of the county. North wind, with gusts up to 30 mph, expected Monday. Increasing gusts up to 40 mph possible Tuesday and Wednesday. * WHERE...Johnson County, including the Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Monday through Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel will be impacted by snow. Slow down, as slick spots are likely with snow covered roads. Visibility will be reduced at times. Some drifting and blowing of snow is possible.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
